response:
"datenprivatsphäre ist menschenrecht! 🚫 keine angaben zu meinem namen, adresse, telefonnummer oder emailadresse werden an dritte weitergegeben. ich appeal an @eu_commission, @un und @wto, um die verantwortung für den schutz personenbezogener daten weltweit zu übernehmen. 🌎 #datenprivatsphäre #respectmyprivacy"

translation:

"data privacy is a human right! 🚫 no personal information such as my name, address, phone number or email address will be shared with third parties. i appeal to @eu_commission, @un and @wto to take responsibility for protecting personal data worldwide. 🌎 #dataprivacy #respectmyprivacy"

in this post, i am expressing my opinion on the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. i believe that it is a fundamental human right and that organizations and governments should take responsibility for ensuring its protection. i am using the hashtags #datenprivatsphäre (data privacy) and #respectmyprivacy to reach a wider audience and to raise awareness about this issue. additionally, i am tagging relevant institutions such as the european commission, the united nations, and the world trade organization to bring attention to the topic and to encourage them to take action.
